extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: Those cliffs really do not make any sense.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Ces falaises n'ont vraiment aucun sens.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: When do you expect them to arrive?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Tu t'attends à ce qu'ils arrivent quand ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: This is none of your concern anymore.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Cela ne te concerne plus maintenant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: I will deal with this on my own.
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Je vais m'occuper de ça moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.orig: So Tronny, how unrealistic is this rock in particular?
extension/post-game/data/maps/dreams/pos.text: Dis-moi, Tronny, à quel point ce rocher n'est-il pas réaliste ?
J'imagine qu'il est un peu plausible...
